Message: The user completes the submission of the form
my ads are still pending its been pretty long

Hey Rassal, I'm sorry to hear that your ads are still pending. The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Sometimes it can be quicker, but if it's been longer than that, there might be an issue. You can check the status of your ads in your account or contact support for more details. Here's a helpful article on ad approval times: [Ad Approval Process](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad).

You can contact News Break support by submitting a request through their Help Center. Here's the link to get you started: [Contact News Break](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide). If you need further assistance, feel free to let me know!
Connecting you to a live agent. Please hold.

Message:
Thank you for reaching out regarding your ad account and ad approval request. Unfortunately, we were unable to verify your business and account based on the information provided. As a result, our Ad Operations and Trust & Safety teams cannot approve your ads at this time.

If you would like to proceed with verification and request a review of this decision, please provide the following details to adsupport@newsbreak.com:

Full company address
Legal entity name
EHID or DUNS number
Primary contact personâ€™s name
Company phone number

Once we receive and verify this information, we will be able to proceed with approving your account and ads.
